tour.welcome_question: Do you already know the platform?
tour.welcome_description: Would you like to take a guided tour to learn all the features of Artificiall?
tour.welcome: Welcome to the Artificiall platform! Let's take a guided tour to learn all the features.
tour.sidebar: This is the main menu. Here you find access to all platform features.
tour.dashboard: The Dashboard shows an overview of your activities and usage statistics.
tour.text_generation: Here you can generate texts using artificial intelligence. Automatically create various types of content.
tour.image_generation: In this section you can create images using AI. Describe what you want and see the magic happen!
tour.video_generation: Create impressive videos with artificial intelligence. Transform ideas into audiovisual content.
tour.download_bot: Automate premium downloads from Freepik and Envato Elements. Paste the link and we'll automatically download it to your Google Drive.
tour.subscription: Manage your subscription and plans. Choose the plan that best meets your needs.
tour.profile: View and edit your personal information and profile settings.
tour.settings: Configure platform preferences, notifications, and other personal settings.
tour.admin: Administrative panel to manage users and system settings.
tour.conclusion: Congratulations! You now know all the main features of the platform. Explore and make the most of it!
upgrade_modal.text_generation.title: Text Generation
upgrade_modal.text_generation.descriptio: Unlock AI text generation. Available in Basic, Premium, and Pro plans.
upgrade_modal.video_generation.title: Exclusive Video Generation
upgrade_modal.video_generation.descripti: Unlock incredible video creation with generative AI. Available only on Pro plan.
upgrade_modal.image_generation.title: Premium Image Generation
upgrade_modal.image_generation.descripti: Create stunning images with AI. Available on Premium and Pro plans.
upgrade_modal.download_bot.title: Freepik/Envato Artificiall
upgrade_modal.download_bot.description: Automate premium downloads from Freepik and Envato. Available on Basic, Premium, and Pro plans.
upgrade_modal.audio_generation.title: Professional Audio Generation
upgrade_modal.audio_generation.descripti: Produce high-quality audio with AI. Available on Premium and Pro plans.
upgrade_modal.file_attachments.title: File Attachments
upgrade_modal.file_attachments.descripti: Attach images, documents and more to enrich your conversations. Available on Premium and Pro plans.
upgrade_modal.advanced_models.title: Advanced AI Models
upgrade_modal.advanced_models.descriptio: Access to the latest and most powerful models like Gemini 2.5 Pro and Claude. Available on Premium and Pro plans.
upgrade_modal.custom_temperature.title: Creativity Control
upgrade_modal.custom_temperature.descrip: Customize the creativity level of responses by adjusting temperature. Available on Premium and Pro plans.
upgrade_modal.high_resolution.title: High Resolution
upgrade_modal.high_resolution.descriptio: Generate high-resolution content for maximum quality. Available on Premium and Pro plans.
upgrade_modal.basic_restriction: The {feature} option is not available on your Basic plan. Upgrade to Premium or Pro to unlock this functionality.
upgrade_modal.free_restriction: The {feature} option is not available on your Free plan. Upgrade to Premium to unlock this functionality.
upgrade_modal.premium_video_restriction: Video generation is not available on your Premium plan. Upgrade to Pro plan to unlock this functionality.
upgrade_modal.image_limit.title: Image limit reached
upgrade_modal.image_limit.free: You have reached the 10 image limit on the Free plan. Upgrade to Premium to continue.
upgrade_modal.image_limit.premium: You have reached the image limit on the Premium plan. Upgrade to Pro to continue.
